content: the court of appeal in salerno made a final decision in a case about dividing inherited assets among family members one family member was given full ownership of the assets while the others were denied their claims for profits and compensation the court also appointed an expert to help with dividing the assets and scheduled multiple hearings the court decided that the inherited property could not be divided and ordered its sale with the proceeds being split equally among the family members the court rejected further claims for profits and compensation this decision is final but there is another related case still ongoing

metadata.CASE_ID: Court of Appeal of Salerno sec. II, 29/12/2022
